text.autoconfig.fallingleaves.title: Falling Leaves
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves.option.lea: How fast leaves are spawning. Default is 1.0, maximum is 75
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves.option.con: How fast conifer leaves are spawning. Default is 0.0, maximum is 75
Block IDs which will drop conifer leaves
text.autoconfig.fallingleaves.option.rat: You can add your own overrides by editing config/fallingleaves.json
